extension.welcome: Transform your web browsing experience using AI with Shinkai Visor ✨

desktop.welcome: Transform your desktop experience using AI with Shinkai Desktop

chat.emptyStateDescription: Try “How to make a HTTP request in JavaScript” , “Give me the top 10 rock music in the 80s”, “Explain me how internet works”
chat.allMessagesLoaded: All previous messages have been loaded ✅
chat.limitReachedDescription: You've used all of your queries for the month on this model/agent. Please start a new chat with another agent.

form.message: Tell us the job you want to do
form.messagePlaceholder: Eg: Explain me how internet works...
form.setContextText: Add files or folders for your AI to use as context during your conversation.

context.title: Conversation Context
context.description: List of folders and files used as context for this conversation

editMessage.warning: This will restart your conversation from here.

fileProcessing.title: Your file is being processed
fileProcessing.description: It can take a few minutes

aiFilesSearch.label: AI Files Content Search
aiFilesSearch.description: Search to find content across all files in your AI Files easily

vectorFs.label: My AI Files Explorer

actions.uploadFileText: Uploading your files transforms them to be AI-ready and available to use in Shinkai.
actions.shareFolderText: You can share folders that you store in AI Files with anyone.
actions.unshareFolderText:
Everyone will be removed from this folder. You’ll still keep a copy of this folder in your AI Files.
Note: Removed members will keep a copy of this shared folder.

emptyState.noFilesAndFolders: This will be the home for all your files.
emptyState.noFilesAndFoldersDescription: Use the "+" button to start uploading files.
emptyState.noSharedFolders: Your shared folders will be displayed here.

vectorFs.deleteFolderConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this folder? This action cannot be undone.
vectorFs.deleteFileConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this file? This action cannot be undone.

shareFolderWarning.title: Enable Folder Sharing
shareFolderWarning.text: You must register a Shinkai identity before you can share folders over the Shinkai Network.

notifications.runningNode: Your local Shinkai Node is running
notifications.stoppedNode: Your local Shinkai Node was stopped
notifications.removedNote: Your local Shinkai Node storage was removed
notifications.syncedOllama: Local Ollama models synchronized with your Shinkai Node
notifications.errorSyncOllama: Error synchronizing your local Ollama models with your Shinkai Node

resetNodeWarning.title: Unable to connect
resetNodeWarning.description: Your Shinkai Node is currently locked by existing keys. To connect again you have two options:
resetNodeWarning.option1: Restore: Try to restore your connection using a backed up keys.
resetNodeWarning.option2: Reset: Delete your Shinkai Node Storage (this will permanently delete all your data).

onboardingChecklist.setupShinkaiDesktopDescription: Setup Shinkai Desktop to get started
onboardingChecklist.addAIDescription: Add an AI agent that utilizes your favorite LLM
onboardingChecklist.createAIChatDescription: Start a conversation with your AI
onboardingChecklist.uploadAFileDescription: Keep your notes, websites, docs and others securely stored in one place.
onboardingChecklist.askFilesDescription: Chat with your files. Ask any questions, find information, get summaries and more.

includeClickSummary.title: Include 1-Click Summary Option
includeClickSummary.text: Adds a Summary Button to the Quick Access hover menu.

includeClickImageCapture.title: Include 1-Click Image Capture Option
includeClickImageCapture.text: Adds an Image Capture Button to the Quick Access hover menu.

quickAccessButton.label: Show Shinkai Quick Access Button
quickAccessButton.description: The Quick Access Button can be moved by clicking and holding.

shortcutKey.label: Shortcut Key
shortcutKey.description: Modify the shortcut key to launch sidebar

exportConnection.label: Export Connection
exportConnection.downloadText: Download and keep this connection file in a safe place
exportConnection.restoreText: Use it with your passphrase to restore the connection to your Shinkai Node

restoreConnection.label: Restore Connection
restoreConnection.description: Use a connection file and passphrase

common.clickToUpload: Click to upload or drag and drop
common.termsAndConditionsText: I agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy

quickConnection.label: Quick Connection
quickConnection.connectingToNode: Connecting to your local Shinkai Node

analytics.label: Analytics
analytics.title: Help us improve Shinkai

bulletPoints.one: ✅ Always allow you to opt-out via Settings
bulletPoints.three: ✅ Send analytical information about what features you use but without any content or responses
bulletPoints.six: ❌ Never use personal information for training purposes

analytics.moreInfo: Fore more information in relation to our privacy practices, please see our Privacy Policy

delete.label: Delete AI
delete.description: Are you sure you want to delete this AI? This action cannot be undone.

notFound.title: No available AIs
notFound.description: Connect your first AI to start asking Shinkai AI. Try connecting OpenAI

localAI.installText: After installing AI models on your local machine, they will become available as AI

errors.failedToFetch: Failed to fetch local Ollama models. Please ensure Ollama is running correctly.

form.evmAddressHelper: Add the EVM Address you are using in Galxe

success.registerDesktopInstallation: Your Shinkai Desktop installation was registered successfully. It may take some hours to be registered in Galxe quest.

errors.registerDesktopInstallation: Error registering your Shinkai Desktop installation. Please ensure your EVM Address was not used previously to register a different installation.

disconnect.modalDescription: Are you sure you want to disconnect? This will permanently delete your data
disconnect.exportConnection: Before continuing, please<Link>export your connection</Link>to restore your connection at any time.

nodeUnavailable.title: Node Unavailable
nodeUnavailable.description: We're having trouble connecting to your Shinkai Node. Your node may be offline, or your internet connection may be down.

messageReceived.label: Message Received
messageReceived.description: You have received a response from {{inboxName}}
